description: This file defines the game state management using Zustand. It creates a store with functions to start, pause, resume, save, and load the game, managing overlays and game state.

methods.name: startGame
methods.description: Initializes and starts the game, setting the game state and overlay.

methods.name: pauseGame
methods.description: Pauses the game and sets the overlay to pause menu.

methods.name: resumeGame
methods.description: Resumes the game and resets the overlay.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the saved game state or defaults.
